events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under Engineering based on their experience with software development and devops practices.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage this application and will initiate contact with the candidate for an initial screening.
The initial screening call with the candidate was positive, discussing their engineering background and motivation for joining our software team.
The candidate responded promptly with enthusiasm to proceed with the technical interview scheduled for next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th to evaluate the candidate's coding skills and devops knowledge.
